GetClassType.name: GetClassType
GetClassType.description: Get the type of this class.

SetStyleColBandSize.name: SetStyleColBandSize
SetStyleColBandSize.description: Specify the number of columns which will comprise each table column band for this table style.

params.name: nCount
params.description: The number of columns measured in positive integers.

SetStyleRowBandSize.name: SetStyleRowBandSize
SetStyleRowBandSize.description: Specify the number of rows which will comprise each table row band for this table style.

params.name: nCount
params.description: The number of rows measured in positive integers.

SetJc.name: SetJc
SetJc.description: Specify the alignment of the current table with respect to the text margins in the current section.

params.name: sJcType
params.description: The alignment type used for the current table placement.

SetShd.name: SetShd
SetShd.description: Specify the shading which is applied to the extents of the current table.

params.name: sType
params.description: The shading type applied to the extents of the current table.

params.name: r
params.description: Red color component value.

params.name: g
params.description: Green color component value.

params.name: b
params.description: Blue color component value.

params.name: isAuto
params.description: The true value will disable the SetShd method use.

SetTableBorderTop.name: SetTableBorderTop
SetTableBorderTop.description: Set the border which will be displayed at the top of the current table.

params.name: sType
params.description: The top border style.

params.name: nSize
params.description: The width of the current top border measured in eighths of a point.

params.name: nSpace
params.description: The spacing offset in the top part of the table measured in points used to place this border.

params.name: r
params.description: Red color component value.

params.name: g
params.description: Green color component value.

params.name: b
params.description: Blue color component value.

SetTableBorderBottom.name: SetTableBorderBottom
SetTableBorderBottom.description: Set the border which will be displayed at the bottom of the current table.

params.name: sType
params.description: The bottom border style.

params.name: nSize
params.description: The width of the current bottom border measured in eighths of a point.

params.name: nSpace
params.description: The spacing offset in the bottom part of the table measured in points used to place this border.

params.name: r
params.description: Red color component value.

params.name: g
params.description: Green color component value.

params.name: b
params.description: Blue color component value.

SetTableBorderLeft.name: SetTableBorderLeft
SetTableBorderLeft.description: Set the border which will be displayed on the left of the current table.

params.name: sType
params.description: The left border style.

params.name: nSize
params.description: The width of the current left border measured in eighths of a point.

params.name: nSpace
params.description: The spacing offset in the left part of the table measured in points used to place this border.

params.name: r
params.description: Red color component value.

params.name: g
params.description: Green color component value.

params.name: b
params.description: Blue color component value.

SetTableBorderRight.name: SetTableBorderRight
SetTableBorderRight.description: Set the border which will be displayed on the right of the current table.

params.name: sType
params.description: The right border style.

params.name: nSize
params.description: The width of the current right border measured in eighths of a point.

params.name: nSpace
params.description: The spacing offset in the right part of the table measured in points used to place this border.

params.name: r
params.description: Red color component value.

params.name: g
params.description: Green color component value.

params.name: b
params.description: Blue color component value.

SetTableBorderInsideH.name: SetTableBorderInsideH
SetTableBorderInsideH.description: Specify the border which will be displayed on all horizontal table cell borders which are not on an outmost edgeof the parent table (all horizontal borders which are not the topmost or bottommost border).

params.name: sType
params.description: The horizontal table cell border style.

params.name: nSize
params.description: The width of the current border measured in eighths of a point.

params.name: nSpace
params.description: The spacing offset in the horizontal table cells of the table measured in points used to place this border.

params.name: r
params.description: Red color component value.

params.name: g
params.description: Green color component value.

params.name: b
params.description: Blue color component value.

SetTableBorderInsideV.name: SetTableBorderInsideV
SetTableBorderInsideV.description: Specify the border which will be displayed on all vertical table cell borders which are not on an outmost edgeof the parent table (all vertical borders which are not the leftmost or rightmost border).

params.name: sType
params.description: The vertical table cell border style.

params.name: nSize
params.description: The width of the current border measured in eighths of a point.

params.name: nSpace
params.description: The spacing offset in the vertical table cells of the table measured in points used to place this border.

params.name: r
params.description: Red color component value.

params.name: g
params.description: Green color component value.

params.name: b
params.description: Blue color component value.

SetTableCellMarginBottom.name: SetTableCellMarginBottom
SetTableCellMarginBottom.description: Specify the amount of space which will be left between the bottom extent of the cell contents and the borderof all table cells within the parent table (or table row).

params.name: nValue
params.description: The value for the amount of space below the bottom extent of the cell measured intwentieths of a point (1/1440 of an inch).

SetTableCellMarginLeft.name: SetTableCellMarginLeft
SetTableCellMarginLeft.description: Specify the amount of space which will be present between the left extent of the cell contents and the leftborder of all table cells within the parent table (or table row).

params.name: nValue
params.description: The value for the amount of space to the left extent of the cell measured in twentieths of a point (1/1440 of an inch).

SetTableCellMarginRight.name: SetTableCellMarginRight
SetTableCellMarginRight.description: Specify the amount of space which will be present between the right extent of the cell contents and the rightborder of all table cells within the parent table (or table row).

params.name: nValue
params.description: The value for the amount of space to the right extent of the cell measured in twentieths of a point (1/1440 of an inch).

SetTableCellMarginTop.name: SetTableCellMarginTop
SetTableCellMarginTop.description: Specify the amount of space which will be present between the top extent of the cell contents and the top borderof all table cells within the parent table (or table row).

params.name: nValue
params.description: The value for the amount of space above the top extent of the cell measured in twentieths of a point (1/1440 of an inch).

SetCellSpacing.name: SetCellSpacing
SetCellSpacing.description: Specify the default table cell spacing (the spacing between adjacent cells and the edges of the table).

params.name: nValue
params.description: Spacing value measured in twentieths of a point (1/1440 of an inch). "Null" means no spacing will be applied.

SetTableInd.name: SetTableInd
SetTableInd.description: Specify the indentation which will be added before the leading edge of the current table in the document(the left edge in a left-to-right table, and the right edge in a right-to-left table).

params.name: nValue
params.description: The indentation value measured in twentieths of a point (1/1440 of an inch).

SetWidth.name: SetWidth
SetWidth.description: Set the preferred width for this table.<note>Tables are created with the ApiTable.SetWidth method properties set by default, which always override the {@link ApiTablePr#SetWidth} method properties. That is why there is no use to try and apply ApiTablePr.SetWidth, we recommend that you use the  {@link ApiTablePr#SetWidth}  method instead.</node>

params.name: sType
params.description: Type of the width value from one of the available width values types.

params.name: nValue
params.description: The table width value measured in positive integers.

SetTableLayout.name: SetTableLayout
SetTableLayout.description: Specify the algorithm which will be used to lay out the contents of this table within the document.

params.name: sType
params.description: The type of the table layout in the document.
